TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed IMPLTYPEFLAGS extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines the attributes of an implemented or inherited interface of a type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For additional information about `IMPLTYPEFLAGS`, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMPLTYPEFLAGS IMPLTYPEFLAG_FDEFAULT = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The interface or dispinterface represents the default for the source or sink.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMPLTYPEFLAGS IMPLTYPEFLAG_FDEFAULTVTABLE = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Sinks receive events through the virtual function table (VTBL).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMPLTYPEFLAGS IMPLTYPEFLAG_FRESTRICTED = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The member should not be displayed or programmable by users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMPLTYPEFLAGS IMPLTYPEFLAG_FSOURCE = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This member of a coclass is called rather than implemented.
